No connection to database. Check your internet.

TL;DR The app only collects data for fixing crashes. This improves both our lives.

Collected data

Anime Face Keyboard gathers anonymous usage and crash information. In the case of crash reports on Crashlytics, some information concerning the device is visible, such as make and model, free storage space and memory available.Information such as your email address, identity, IP-address, MAC-address, Bluetooth device name, etc., are not collected.

Services used

Anime Face Keyboard uses the following services:

  • - Google Play, which offers limited insights into reviews and crashes;
  • - Crashlytics, which provides more detailed insights into crashes.

Usage

Crash information allows the developers to research problems in the app and fix them, thus making the app more stable.
